title: Ticket #1016: Unified Logging and Rotation
description: Condor has several places where it writes ongoing files, including the dprintf logs, the user logs, the event logs, the history files. All of these use different code, with different locking, and rotation strategies. We need to have a single bit of code that handles this, and handles it in a way such they when we lose events because of rotation, we can tell at least how many events were lost.
